block.p: BASEBALL American League DETROIT TIGERS--Transferred 1B Tony Clark from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Claimed P Eric DuBose off waivers from the Cleveland Indians. Pacific Coast League CALGARY CANNONS--Announced the renewal of their player development contract with the Florida Marlins through the 2002 season.

BASEBALL American League DETROIT TIGERS--Transferred 1B Tony Clark from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Claimed P Eric DuBose off waivers from the Cleveland Indians. Pacific Coast League CALGARY CANNONS--Announced the renewal of their player development contract with the Florida Marlins through the 2002 season.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association ORLANDO MAGIC--Signed F Ed O'Bannon. International Basketball League FARGO-MOORHEAD BEEZ--Added F Derrick Taylor and F Brad Mann to roster. SASKATCHEWAN HAWKS--Added G Franklin Paul and F Landers Nolley to roster.

HOCKEY National Hockey League CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Named Mike Smith general manager. Reassigned G Erasmo Saltarelli, D Marty Wilford, D Steve Poapst, D Jeff Paul, F Geoff Peters, F Valentin Morozov, F Colin Pepperall, F Mike Souza, F Brian McCollough and F Casey Hankinson to Norfolk of the AHL. COLORADO AVALANCHE--Reassigned G Phillippe Sauve and G Frederic Cassivi to Hershey of the AHL. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed D Nick Schultz. Assigned LW Pascal DuPuis, LW Peter Bartos, D Eric Charron, G Zack Bierk and G David Brumby to Cleveland of the IHL. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Announced the retirement of RW Ron Stern. Signed G Steve Shields to a one-year contract. Assigned D Steve Bancroft, D Dave MacIsaac, G Vesa Toskala, C Andy Lundbohm, RW Jon Cheechoo and LW Jarrett Deuling to Kentucky of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Reassigned LW Nils Ekman and C Thomas Ziegler to Detroit of the IHL. Returned RW Nikita Alexeev to Erie of the OHL. East Coast Hockey League DAYTON BOMBERS--Traded RW Jason Payne to Arkansas for D Bill McCauley. Western Professional Hockey League AMARILLO RATTLERS--Signed D Tony White. EL PASO BUZZARDS--Signed F Daniel Bienvenue, F Jean-Simon Joliette, D Rhett Dudley, D David McCutcheon, D Jason Tessier, D Francois Bordeau, and G Jeff Lem. Re-Signed D Mike Rees, F Shane Tidsbury and F Cory Herman. LUBBOCK COTTON KINGS--Signed F Eric Landry and F Jason Burke. SAN ANGELO OUTLAWS--Signed G Sergei Tkachenko.

COLLEGEs DEPAUL--Suspended sophomore basketball F Jon Oden for two games for violations of team standards. IOWA STATE--Named Misty Snider assistant softball coach. NORTHERN ARIZONA--Announced the suspension of senior WR Francis St. Paul has been extended to six consecutive games. NORTHERN IOWA--Named Christy Hebert and Jody Dean assistant softball coaches. RHODE ISLAND--Named Donna Konuch and Ken Stanley assistant softball coaches. ST. PETER'S, N.J.--Named Mary Wessely associate director of athletics, compliance officer and senior woman administrator. TULANE--Named J.D. Barnett senior associate athletic director for revenue development. UC SAN DIEGO--Named Wendy Taylor assistant athletic director for compliance.
